title: Integrated Science Education Game Course Based on Personalized Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Blended environment combining game-based learning systems and real-time video lectures for customized science education targeting current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners improve scientific problem-solving abilities by over 80% through personalized game-based assignments
Learners autonomously design and adjust learning paths using adaptive game mechanics

Learners will use Miro or MURAL during a 3-week team project to create a project report (≥5 pages) and presentation (10 minutes) meeting at least four of five scientific communication checklist items (clarity, logic, evidence, visual expression, creativity).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
